attributes.action: Welcome and support refugees fleeing the Ukrainian conflict
attributes.additional_details:
A generation ago, the UK saved the lives of thousands of families from the Balkans through an evacuation and resettlement programme. 

The government should now respond with a well-resourced initiative working with councils across the country, to welcome Ukrainians who need sanctuary.
attributes.background:
Up to 5 million Ukrainians may be displaced following the invasion of Ukraine by Russian forces. 

The UK has provided no legal route for these people to enter the UK and claim asylum.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
